name: @elastic-dao/sdk
description: SDK for ElasticDAO contracts and core modules
author: Dan Matthews <dan@cryptobuilders.io>

scripts.lint: yarn prettier && npx eslint src/*.js src/**/*.js src/**/**/*.js src/**/**/**/*.js
scripts.prettier: yarn artifacts && npx prettier --write src/*.js --write src/**/*.js --write src/**/**/*.js --write src/**/**/**/*.js
scripts.workflow:lint: bash ./scripts/setupArtifacts.sh && npx eslint src/*.js src/**/*.js src/**/**/*.js src/**/**/**/*.js
